objects.description: [VIRTUALPIE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1218) is a Python-based backdoor malware.(Citation: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence ESXi VIBs 2022)(Citation: Google Cloud Mandiant UNC3886 2024)
